import React,{useState}from'react';import{ethers}from'ethers';import{provider,contract}from'../../ethers';import axios from'axios';import'./CreateProject.css';function CreateProject(){const[projectName,setProjectName]=useState('');const[projectType,setProjectType]=useState('Education');const[projectDescription,setProjectDescription]=useState('');const[fundingGoal,setFundingGoal]=useState('');const[milestoneGoals,setMilestoneGoals]=useState(['']);const[milestoneDeadlines,setMilestoneDeadlines]=useState(['']);const[fundingTimeoutHours,setFundingTimeoutHours]=useState('0');const[fundingTimeoutMinutes,setFundingTimeoutMinutes]=useState('0');const[isCreating,setIsCreating]=useState(false);const handleMilestoneGoalChange=(index,value)=>{const newMilestoneGoals=[...milestoneGoals];newMilestoneGoals[index]=value;setMilestoneGoals(newMilestoneGoals);};const handleMilestoneDeadlineChange=(index,value)=>{const newMilestoneDeadlines=[...milestoneDeadlines];newMilestoneDeadlines[index]=value;setMilestoneDeadlines(newMilestoneDeadlines);};const addMilestone=()=>{setMilestoneGoals([...milestoneGoals,'']);setMilestoneDeadlines([...milestoneDeadlines,'']);};const deleteMilestone=()=>{if(milestoneGoals.length>1){setMilestoneGoals(milestoneGoals.slice(0,-1));setMilestoneDeadlines(milestoneDeadlines.slice(0,-1));}};const createProject=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setIsCreating(true);try{await provider.send("eth_requestAccounts",[]);const signer=provider.getSigner();const fundingGoalInWei=ethers.utils.parseEther(fundingGoal);const milestoneGoalsInWei=milestoneGoals.map(goal=>ethers.utils.parseEther(goal));const milestoneDeadlinesInSeconds=milestoneDeadlines.map(deadline=>parseInt(deadline,10)*86400);const fundingTimeoutInSeconds=parseInt(fundingTimeoutHours,10)*3600+parseInt(fundingTimeoutMinutes,10)*60;const tx=await contract.connect(signer).createProject(fundingGoalInWei,milestoneGoalsInWei,milestoneDeadlinesInSeconds,fundingTimeoutInSeconds);const receipt=await tx.wait();const event=receipt.events.find(event=>event.event==='ProjectCreated');if(!event){throw new Error('ProjectCreated event not found');}const projectId=event.args.projectId;const projectDeadline=new Date(Date.now()+fundingTimeoutInSeconds*1000);const milestones=milestoneDeadlines.map((days,index)=>({projectId:projectId.toNumber(),milestoneId:index,projectName,milestoneDDL:new Date(projectDeadline.getTime()+parseInt(days,10)*86400*1000),goal:ethers.utils.parseEther(milestoneGoals[index]).toString()// 添加 goal 字段
}));const projectData={projectId:projectId.toNumber(),projectName,projectType,projectDescription,creator:tx.from,fundingGoal:ethers.utils.parseEther(fundingGoal).toString(),amountRaised:'0',status:'Pending',contributors:[],createdAt:new Date(),projectDDL:projectDeadline,milestones};await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/projects',projectData);const activityData={type:'Create Project',projectId:projectId.toNumber(),user:tx.from,details:projectData};await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/activities',activityData);alert('Project created successfully');resetForm();}catch(error){console.error('Error creating project:',error);alert("Error creating project: ".concat(error.message));}finally{setIsCreating(false);}};const resetForm=()=>{setProjectName('');setProjectType('Education');setProjectDescription('');setFundingGoal('');setMilestoneGoals(['']);setMilestoneDeadlines(['']);setFundingTimeoutHours('0');setFundingTimeoutMinutes('0');};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"create-project-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",null,"Create Project"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:createProject},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",null,"Project Name: "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",value:projectName,onChange:e=>setProjectName(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isCreating})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",null,"Project Type: "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("select",{value:projectType,onChange:e=>setProjectType(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isCreating},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("option",{value:"Education"},"Education"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("option",{value:"Finance"},"Finance"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("option",{value:"AI"},"AI"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("option",{value:"Medical"},"Medical"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("option",{value:"Others"},"Others"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",null,"Project Description: "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("textarea",{value:projectDescription,onChange:e=>setProjectDescription(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isCreating})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",null,"Funding Goal (in Ether): "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",value:fundingGoal,onChange:e=>setFundingGoal(e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isCreating})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",null,"Milestone Goals (in Ether): "),milestoneGoals.map((goal,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{key:index,type:"text",value:goal,onChange:e=>handleMilestoneGoalChange(index,e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isCreating})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"button-group"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"button",onClick:addMilestone,disabled:isCreating},"Add Milestone"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"button",onClick:deleteMilestone,disabled:isCreating||milestoneGoals.length<=1,className:milestoneGoals.length<=1?'disabled':''},"Delete "),milestoneDeadlines.map((deadline,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{key:index,type:"text",value:deadline,onChange:e=>handleMilestoneDeadlineChange(index,e.target.value),required:true,disabled:isCreating}))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",null,"Funding Timeout: "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"timeout-inputs"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"number",value:fundingTimeoutHours,onChange:e=>setFundingTimeoutHours(e.target.value),min:"0",required:true,disabled:isCreating}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",null,"Hours"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"number",value:fundingTimeoutMinutes,onChange:e=>setFundingTimeoutMinutes(e.target.value),min:"0",max:"60",required:true,disabled:isCreating}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",null,"Minutes"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"submit",disabled:isCreating},isCreating?'Creating...':'Create Project'))));}export default CreateProject;
